{"step_by_step_thinking": "The soft palate is a part of the oral cavity. It is made up of a mucous membrane, which is its outer layer, and muscles, which give it its shape and allow it to move. The muscles in the soft palate include the palatoglossus and palatopharyngeus. The uvula is also a part of the soft palate.", "answer_choice": "D. All of the above"}
